overview.en: SOMT chain is a fusion of gem and blockchain technology. It uses gems to anchor currency assets and relies on encrypted wallets to implement storage and transaction operations. It provides a cross-platform payment system and is widely used in shopping, games, entertainment and other applications Scenes.
overview.zh: SOMT宝石链是宝石与区块链技术的融合，以宝石锚定货币资产，依托加密钱包来实现储存和交易操作，提供跨平台的支付系统，广泛运用于购物、游戏、娱乐等各种运用支付场景。
